StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
* An erudite B.Tech. (CSE) professional zealous to start the career as an entry-level in Business Analytics with a reputed firm
* Offering 10 months' experience in Data Analysis
* Excellent aptitude in supporting data-driven decisions and working with different teams to gather data, measure business
performance & produce valuable conclusions that can help companies make informed decisions on the future of the business
* Talented Analyst with exceptional background in utilizing data from diverse information systems to build tools and
forecasting models that remarkably improve organizational decision making capabilities
* Skilled in data acquisition & extraction, data analysis (quantitative and qualitative), data presentation and reporting;
proficient in analysing & presenting conclusions gained from analyzing data
* Expertise in preparing financial operational reports in form of charts, graphs & tables

PositionHistory.Title: Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Key Result Areas:
* Ensuring the deadlines for Actuarial processes are being met and high quality product is delivered
* Developing & implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical
efficiency and quality
* Acquiring data from primary or secondary data sources and maintaining databases
* Analysing data using MY-SQL, Excel (Advanced), Python, R Programming, In-House Tools, Excel VBA for automation
of company speci?c Tools as well as rectifying huge data for ensuring quality product delivery
* Using statistical methods to analyze data and generate useful business reports


https://freesearch.naukri.com/preview/printResume?uname=836   00809030f211d4e58485f0f1207006&sid=3810263223&AT=1580680858
2/2/20 23&01


* Performing data acquisition & extraction, data analysis (quantitative and qualitative), data presentation and reporting
* Presenting client specific actionable information in the form of daily, weekly and monthly reports; preparing executive
reports showing the performance of the business unit against the goals
* Delivering KPI reports to clients and stakeholders using presentations / diagrams; reviewing reports and data to ensure errorless process of merging/de-duplication of customer records

Highlights:
* Won "You Have Earned It" (YHEI) for exceptional performance for Jul'19- Sep'19 quarter in Oct'19
* Conferred with "Pat On The Back" at AXA XL for excellent performance and smart work shown within the organisation
in August 2019
* Automated various processes using Python and R which saved the time in manual data fetching & analysis

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 49% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (CSE) from Jaypee Institute of Information Technology in 2019
